roles.note: verb frame's arg2-PRD not necessary in this nominalization

example.name: arg1
example.text: California property owners have benefited from a tax rollback ...

example.name: both args
example.text: Cook County commissioners couldn't make their rollback of the county's controversial sales tax stick Tuesday
